metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23109 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Buffer overflow vulnerability in function convert_colorspace in heif_colorconversion.cc in libheif v1.6.2, allows attackers to cause a denial of service and disclose sensitive information, via a crafted HEIF file.

criterions.comment: libheif: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
